DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: A name to be used for the constraint (e.g., ChillerCoefficientOfPerformance).

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A description that may apply additional information about a constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: ConstraintGrade
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that qualifies the type of constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: ConstraintSource
DocAttribute.Documentation: Any source material, such as a code or standard, from which the constraint originated.

DocAttribute.Name: CreatingActor
DocAttribute.Documentation: Person and/or organization that has created the constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: CreationTime
DocAttribute.Documentation: Time when information specifying the constraint instance was created.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedGrade
DocAttribute.Documentation: Allows for specification of user defined grade of the constraint beyond the enumeration values (hard, soft, advisory) provided by ConstraintGrade attribute of type _IfcConstraintEnum_. When a value is provided for attribute UserDefinedGrade in parallel the attribute ConstraintGrade shall have enumeration value USERDEFINED.

DocAttribute.Name: ClassifiedAs
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the constraint classifications through objectified relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatesConstraints
DocAttribute.Documentation: References to the objectified relationships that relate other constraints with this constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: IsRelatedWith
DocAttribute.Documentation: References to the objectified relationships that relate this constraint with other constraints.

DocAttribute.Name: PropertiesForConstraint
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the properties to which the constraint is applied.

DocAttribute.Name: Aggregates
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the relationships that collect other constraints into this aggregate constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: IsAggregatedIn
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the relationships that relate this constraint into aggregate constraints.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedGrade must be asserted when the value of the IfcConstraintGradeEnum is set to USERDEFINED.
